main event: A witness observed a stationary object in the sky that appeared to pulsate and emit a bright glowing light for 1 hour and 25 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at night at 2155 hours,The object moved in a northeast to east course during observation,The witness speculated it might be a balloon,The object was only one in sight during the observation,The evaluation concluded it was probably a balloon.
sighted object: a stationary object emitting a bright glowing light
witness description: a lone witness observed the object
